{{{
Option (* = required)                   Description                            
---------------------                   -----------                   
-i, --ignore [Long]                     Set ignore categories. Ex: -i 1,2,3 (default: -1)                        
-r, --result <File>                     Sets the result file. (default: results.csv)                         
* -s, * --source <File>                 Sets the source file.
}}}
